column4: I'm looking for directions to get a windows computer to make a bootable xubuntu (text based) usb drive, can someone point me in the right direction ?
I don't know about text-based, but here is a tutorial for putting *ubuntu on a thumb drive: http://www.debuntu.org/how-to-install-ubuntu-linux-on-usb-bar
I found this, I don't have a CD rom to boot from
